lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What were the names of Eve’s first two sons?
answers: Cain and Abel
Cain and Seth
Jacob and Esau
Abraham and Isaac
He was a farmer
He was a fisherman
He was a shepherd
He was a carpenter
He was a shepherd
He was a farmer
He was a hunter
He was a pizza delivery driver

questions.text: What did Cain and Abel offer to God?
answers: Cain offered some of his crops; Abel offered meat from firstborn sheep
Both of them brought gold and silver
Cain offered animals, and Abel offered fruit and grain
Pizza and tacos

questions.text: What did God do when they brought the offerings?
answers: He was pleased with Abel’s, but not with Cain’s
He was pleased with Cain’s, but not with Abel’s
He rejected both of their offerings
He ignored them and said nothing

questions.text: How did Cain feel about God accepting Abel’s offering, but not his?
answers: Angry and sad
Happy and thankful
Bored and sleepy
Calm and excited

questions.text: What did God say to Cain?
answers: Sin is crouching at your door, ready to grab you, but you must rule over it
Do whatever you feel like; it doesn’t matter
I will make you king over your brother forever
You will never have any problems again

questions.text: Because he was angry, what did Cain do?
answers: Took his brother out to a field and attacked him
He apologized to Abel and hugged him
He ran away and hid from his family
He built an altar and worshiped God instead

questions.text: What curses did God give to Cain?
answers: Crops would not grow for him, he would wander the earth
He would never die and would live forever on earth
He had to build a huge boat to survive a flood
His hair would fall out and he would be bald

questions.text: Why was God pleased with Abel’s sacrifice, but not Cain’s?
answers: Because Abel had faith
Because Abel’s gift was more expensive and shiny
Because God loves shepherds but not farmers
Because Abel was the oldest and God only listens to the oldest child
